mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT (name, code, category, price, amount, isEvent, expdate) values (#{name}, #{code}, #{category}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{isEvent}, #{expdate})
mapper.update: update PRODUCT set name=#{name}, code=#{code}, category=#{category}, price=#{price}, amount=#{amount}, isEvent=#{isEvent}, expdate=#{expdate} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from PRODUCT order by seq desc
